definition: to dash/to move forward quickly/to bulge/to protrude/to break through/to rush out/sudden/Taiwan pr. [tu2]

sentences.english: Liver-derived dendritic cells belong to the antigen-presenting cells.
sentences.chinese: 肝树突状细胞属于抗原递呈细胞。

sentences.english: Dendritic cells induce efficient and specific immune response against liver cancer in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 肝癌病人树突状细胞诱导高效而特异的抗肝癌免疫。

sentences.english: The dendrites usually create a weak network of connections between neurons.
sentences.chinese: 树突通常创造连接神经元之间的一种弱网。

sentences.english: Occasional enlarged and rounded spines were also seen in control slices.
sentences.chinese: 偶尔在对照的脑片上可以看见增粗和圆形的树突棘。

sentences.english: Results The tonsillar dendritic cell sarcoma had no characteristic clinical manifestations.
sentences.chinese: 结果扁桃体树突状细胞肉瘤无特征性临床表现。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the function of dendritic cells in smoking person.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究吸烟者树突状细胞的功能。

sentences.english: Therewere two or three dendrites in each olfactory hair of male antenna.
sentences.chinese: 雄蛾触角的每个毛形感器内有二个或三个树突。

sentences.english: The key difference involves something known as dendritic cells.
sentences.chinese: 关键的差异涉及到某些树突状细胞。

sentences.english: But how might dim light have brought about dendritic spine changes?
sentences.chinese: 但是昏暗光是如何引起树突棘数量变化的呢？

sentences.english: I have attached images of few of the loose stones and Pendants of fine quality dendritic agate.
sentences.chinese: 我附加图片的几个松散的石块和吊坠优质树突状玛瑙。

sentences.english: Testosterone can induces the increase in number of neurons and dendritic growth and synaptogenesis in adulthood.
sentences.chinese: 睾酮能诱导神经元数目增加，树突增长和突触形成。

sentences.english: There was thick wall and no dendrite in mechanoreceptor.
sentences.chinese: 机械感器壁厚无孔，淋巴腔中无树突。

pinyin: shen2 jing1 jiao1 zhi4 xi4 bao1

definition: myelin sheath (membrane surrounding axon of nerve cell)
neuron/also written 神經元|神经元
axon (long thin axis of nerve cell)
